if exists( select * from [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] where table_name = 'membership_User' ) begin select top 3 * from [dbo].[membership_User] end else begin select top 0 GetDate() as FauxColumn end

if not exists(select [table_name] from [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] where [table_name] in ('carrot_DataInfo') ) begin select @DataKey as [DataKey], '' [DataValue] end else begin select [DataKey], [DataValue] from dbo.[carrot_DataInfo] where [DataKey] = @DataKey end

if exists(select [table_name] from [INFORMATION_SCHEMA].[COLUMNS] where [table_name] in ('carrot_DataInfo') ) begin
if not exists(select * from dbo.[carrot_DataInfo] where [DataKey] = @DataKey) begin
insert into dbo.[carrot_DataInfo]([DataInfoID], [DataKey], [DataValue]) values (NewID(), @DataKey, @DataValue)
end else begin
update dbo.[carrot_DataInfo] set [DataValue] = @DataValue where [DataKey] = @DataKey
end
end
